abstract: United States imposes sanctions on 34 people or companies for evading existing sanctions on Russia over country's intervention in Ukraine.
lead_paragraph: The Obama administration imposed sanctions on 34 individuals and companies it said were circumventing American and international restrictions.

headline.main: U.S. Imposes Sanctions Over Russia’s Intervention in Ukraine
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Washington; U.S. Penalizes Russians Over Ukraine

snippet: The Obama administration imposed sanctions on 34 individuals and companies it said were circumventing American and international restrictions.

keywords.value: Office of Foreign Assets Control (United States Treasury)
keywords.name: organizations
